text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-75L8 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-75L8 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-75L8 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-75L8 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-75L8 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
